pages.text: The ME Bridge is able to interact with Applied Energistics 2. You can retrieve items, craft items, get all items as a list and more. The Me Bridge uses one channel.$(p)For the full documentation please see the $(9)$(l:https://docs.srendi.de/peripherals/me_bridge/)official wiki page$(/l)$()!
Connect your ME Bridge to a computer to make use of it!
